summary: This is a brief email from February 14, 2020, regarding an update to a 'PC Unit' short form document. The sender notes they updated a few cases, removed some, and left it for the recipient, suggesting there may be more cases to add. The document appears to be a status update on case tracking.

events.title: PC Unit Short Form Update
events.description: An email was sent updating a 'PC Unit' short form document, noting that some cases were updated and some were removed, with a suggestion to add more cases.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated February 14, 2020, concerning an update to a 'PC Unit' short form document.
The sender indicates they updated a few cases and removed a few, leaving the document for the recipient.
The sender suggests there may be more cases that could be added to the document.
The email is brief and informal, referring to the document as 'a short one.'
The file reference EFTA00104941.pdf and 'Data Set: 9' suggest this is part of a larger collection of Epstein-related documents.
